short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a button on a trello card to copy the short url to the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a button to Trello cards to copy the short URL straight to the clipboard.

Please report any issues into the GitHub Repo - https://github.com/njt1982/TrelloShortUrl
